name: Astrodrifter
description: A fast-paced, top down movement shooter. A drifter must master the art of drifting, the nature of the enemy and the rhythm of attack and defence. Only then can a drifter become The Astrodrifter.

name: A Tithe in Blood
description: A dark yuri visual novel, about a quiet university student who discovers blood magic in the depths of her grief. Stepping into a world she little understands, Honoka finds unexpected love, and inadvertantly sets in motion a deadly series of events.

name: Aztlán Codex: El códice de los ancestros
description: Aztlán Codex: Join Sarah Martinez on an epic hack and slash adventure with platforming. Explore mystical worlds, battle deities, and uncover ancient secrets. Find all six volumes of the Codex and change reality. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Augurium Mortis
description: A distant world in a dystopian future, separated from her squad Amy Sol finds herself being ambushed by enemy forces looking for revenge. Pilot her nimble hovercraft to blow up as many mechs as possible in this fast-paced arena top-down shooter.

name: Battimals
description: Battimals: Combine animal DNA and battle foes in fast-paced matches. Hilarious, strategic fun in quick play sessions. Create your ultimate team!

name: Basketball VR
description: Casual Basketball game, that allows anyone to play 5-5 matches. It should not cause VR discomfort and it's designed to give you fun and relax, so expect plenty of points scored and opponent that will give you a lot of freedom.

name: BatteryNote
description: This is an adventure game. You, a mechanic, have picked up three robots from a scrapyard. You can select one of them and charge and converse with them within a time limit. How you treat them will change their reactions, and the ending of the game will change little by little along with their fate.

name: BaroMaro
description: BaroMaro is a top-down arena hack'n slash rogue-lite featuring hundreds of unique perk cards to collect. Using different weapons, elements and playstyles, OBLITERATE animal kingdom and reunite with your family once more...

name: Barako the Pirate
description: A pirate themed rpg adventure!

name: Bananametr
description: Bananametr is a clicker game where you click on a banana! In Bananametr, you click on a banana to get a bigger banana and compare it with a friend's banana!!

name: Banana Cowboy
description: Play as Banana Cowboy and adventure in fruit-themed universe, rescuing your people from your evil twin who has taken over the Banana Kingdom. Use your trusty lasso and spaceship horse to travel to the Orange Biker and Blueberry Pirate planets and save the universe from the Evil King!

name: Ball Points
description: It is a third-person platform game where the ball is the main character 3D

name: Thieves of Dingirra
description: In this strategy/RPG game, assume the role of the Master Thief, establish a Thieves Guild in Dingirra, recruit NPCs, grow in power, delve into your companions' pasts, and maybe even develop romantic relationships with them. All while aiming to fully conquer the town of Dingirra.

name: Galix: NewHorizons
description: In a distant future where human civilization has crumbled, Earth has become a pristine new world teeming with life. In this open-world ARPG, play as the the courageous Hailey and set out on a journey filled with mystery and adventure. Begin your own fantastical journey as you chase the unknown.

name: SimplePlanes 2
description: Your favorite sim, evolved! Build planes, cars, tanks, or anything you want! Download community crafts for free. New parts, new environments, multiplayer mayhem, endless sandbox fun, and more.

name: Spoop Troop
description: Spoop Troop is a 2-4 player couch co-op/pvp asymmetric casual horror game. Got it? Good! Now get in the van - we're busting ghosts!

name: Void Carrier
description: This game is a difficult puzzle game with many worlds that each have their own gimmicks!

name: Pitfall Protocol
description: Navigate an underground warehouse, approve special items, and eliminate anomalies over a tense 7-day contract or face termination.

name: Paranoid
description: Paranoid is Dungeoncrawler/Roguelike with an oldschool pixelartstyle where you need to survive alone in the dark and discover new items and pills that help you through this dangerous World. Can you find a way out and wake up?

name: Dart The Dog
description: A fast-paced platformer built around gaining speed and momentum.

name: Phantom Xcape
description: Step into 'Phantom Xcape' and become an international spy in a thrilling first-person stealth action game. Use advanced stealth tactics and espionage tools to navigate through challenging missions and make critical decisions that impact the story.

name: Dr. Murph
description: Embark on an erotic intergalactic adventure with the clumsy Dr. Murph and his hot assistant, Repa. Meet other women from a myriad of alien races - and, if you plays your cards right, you might just end up getting lucky!

name: Find Brains
description: Find Brains — action-adventure game with platformer elements. Long-forgotten and forbidden magic began to return to the world. Go on an adventure with slime Kevin and his friend Elis to restore him to his former power!

name: Extermination 1
description: Find the most efficient way to reduce the infected population in casual rogue-lite game Extermination 1. Adapt. Overcome. There are no limits stopping you from snowballing in this reverse bullet hell.

name: Tank Chess
description: Have you ever dreamed of being a great general of the armoured forces? Or maybe a chess grandmaster? Perhaps what you want is just a fun, challenging game you can explain quickly and play with anyone? If that's the case, you're in for a real treat!

name: Oh, Flock!
description: After a strange series of events you find yourself shoved into the role of a Shephard on a very peculiar farm! With only your wits and trusty cursor by your side guide your flock of sheep through a series of environments filled with a variety of obstacles and predators!

name: Good Kill!
description: Good Kill is an immersive FPS game where players take control of a door gunner in a military helicopter during the Vietnam War. Engage in intense combat across destructible environments, complete missions, and upgrade your helicopter and weapons to dominate the battlefield.

name: Souptown Matty
description: Souptown Matty is a story-based mystery-solving dog simulator. Around the time when spirits linger, an unexpected visitor comes and steals your owner's beloved necklace. It's time to take action on your own and start investigating.

name: Delicious: Mansion Mystery
description: Emily & Francois investigate the poisoning of a high-society party host

name: Coastal Kingdoms
description: Build and explore in this tile placing citybuilding roguelite!

name: Bellfortis
description: Control the people and armies, gain territory by force or cunning. Be a clever ruler or a ruthless conqueror in this Middle Ages game that combines turn-based strategy with intense real-time battles.

name: Ronin Rush
description: "Dive into a fast-paced 3D adventure, dodging obstacles, slashing enemies, and conquering epic bosses. Explore vibrant environments and experience exhilarating gameplay and save your village by retrieving the energy stone!"

name: Laniakea
description: Laniakea, an immersive MMORPG, invites you to shape a dynamic world through player-driven economy and classless combat. Explore a vast realm, build wealth, forge alliances, and leave your legacy through thrilling PvP. Your choices will echo through the ages in this unforgettable adventure.

name: Tackle for Loss
description: Tackle for Loss is a 2D top-down action game that puts you in the shoes of a former American football pro. Violent combat, a captivating narrative, and dark pixel art combine to create a pumped-up experience, inspired by the likes of Hotline Miami.

name: SporeBloom
description: Mushroom science meets Turn-Based Strategy in a multiplayer battle for fitness. Spread underground networks and grow fantastical mushrooms. Parasitize your opponents or peacefully scour the map for food and amass impressive networks.

name: Project V: Origins
description: Humanity's last chance against evil.

name: Nulandia
description: A dynamic metaverse to explore, create, and compete. Build and trade virtual real estate, adopt pets, and design unique avatars. Engage in games like Robot Races and Sunset Surfing, utilize AI tools for art and more, and enjoy activities such as beach cinema. Earn Nu and real-life prizes.

name: Lost Legions
description: Lost in the Teutoburg Forest after a historical catastrophic defeat, survive as a Roman soldier in a world filled with danger. Craft, build, explore and fight in this story-rich open-world adventure. Unearth secrets of a forgotten time, alone or with up to 3 friends, in a land where history lingers.

name: Reasons For Kym
description:
Reasons for Kym is a short love
story about giving 7 colorful reasons
to understand and love Kym.

name: Magus Tower
description: Sin descripción

name: Niteline
description: Sin descripción

name: Under the Thorns
description: Clara, a maid, arrives at a shrouded manor. Rumor has it that her new employer is dangerous and has dismissed thirteen maids before her. What secrets is he hiding? A captivating tale of mystery, suspense, and romance.

name: Pocket Kickball
description: Sin descripción

name: Into the Emberlands
description: Venture out into the Emberlands and uncover an ever-changing world filled with surprising encounters and mystical creatures! Save villagers who got lost in the Miasma, collect resources and rebuild your village to create a safe haven for your people.

name: Killbox
description: KILLBOX is an Action game, developed and published by Klimmsword, which was released in 2013. Defend yourself against onslaughts of enemies who emerge from off-screen.

name: WalkScape
description:
WalkScape is a game inspired by some old school MMORPGs. But this game has one major trick up its sleeve: you don't play actively, but instead gain progress by walking.

You can expect a fun and exciting journey through the World of Arenum while also having the motivation to walk!

name: The Zen of Kayaking
description: An 80KB interactive-fiction text adventure game that begins as you set out with your newly acquired kayak one weekend. Created over 10 days by a team of two.

name: Pokemon Kalos Crystal
description: Pokemon Kalos Crystal is a sequel to Unova Red. This is a re-imagining of Generation 2, where the first generation of Pokemon was the Unova Pokedex, and the new second-generation Pokemon is the Kalos Pokedex. This game features all Pokemon from generations 5 and 6, and like in Unova Red, all Pokemon in the Pokedex is obtainable within a single playthrough.

name: Otome Senki
description: Otome Senki is a turn-based dungeon-crawling RPG by Alicesoft

name: Valkyria Chronicles 4: Advance Ops
description:
"A special mission that gives you a weapon useful in the early part of the main game. Additionally, if you complete it, you will also get Edy from the original Valkyria Chronicles as a playable character!

This mission can be played after unlocking the Headquarters in Chapter 2 of the main story. To access this mission, go to Book Mode > Menu > Extra Stories."

name: Akıllı Çay Bardağı
description: Akıllı Çay Bardağı is an AI-based guessing game. It tries to find out the object that you have in mind with an average of 20 questions.

name: Dead or Alive 5: Catalogue Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Wrekless
description: Wrekless is our love letter to skateboarding culture. Play with up to 50 skaters online, pull off crazy tricks, chain combos, and defy gravity. Simultaneously skate and build skateparks and minigames together with other skaters in real-time, and share them with the community.

name: Yooka-Replaylee
description: Embark on an epic open-world 3D platforming collectathon adventure with Yooka and Laylee! The search for Pagies starts anew in Yooka-Replaylee, the enhanced definitive version of the beloved indie darling with all new challenges, secrets, mechanics, and accessibility options.

name: Volgarr the Viking II
description: A hardcore, 2D action-platformer where only precision can keep you from death.

name: Killing Time: Resurrected
description: Journey into a mansion on the Island of Matinicus where you'll arrive to find the mansion full of hellacious demonic creatures. Solve deadly puzzles, uncover the secrets behind a famous mystery and discover an ancient artifact from the Pharaoh Ramses, if you can live long enough to find it.

name: Demon Tides
description: Explore the open seas and uncover the kingdom's dark secrets as you expressively platform your way across dozens of locales, upgrading your gear every step of the way!

name: Motorslice
description: In the ruins of a megastructure, a girl arrives with a single objective: Destroy every machine inside.

name: Wild Tactics
description: The Wildest character-driven tactical strategy game you've ever seen! Build your team and maintain their relationships in the war against organized crime. Uncover the conspiracy in the animal-populated city of Clawville, and find the mastermind behind its downfall!

name: Echo Generation: Midnight Edition
description: Lead a gang of kids to uncover spooky mysteries, battle creatures, and explore the supernatural side of your hometown in Echo Generation, a turn-based adventure set in the 90s. Echo Generation: Midnight Edition adds fast travel, quest tracker, refined combat mechanics, and more.

name: Chirp Song: Wings of Praise
description: This charming bubble shooter game set in the RhymVerse reveals the restorative power of praise as players free the "Chirps" in the Forest of Words from Axilla’s corruption!

name: Hot Wax
description:
You are the Wax Whisperer. Your powers may well be unmatched, but some of your enemies are still out there… Not for much longer though, not with what your are about to unleash.

Burn continuous lines of candles to score points! The longer the fire survives the more points it brings you, and the closer it brings you to unfathomable power from this mysterious temple you’ve found your way to!

name: ChainStaff
description: ChainStaff is a brutal action-platformer with a transforming spear and grappling hook, blazing weapon upgrades, and a rocking soundtrack. Aliens have taken over the Earth! Swing, shoot, and spear your way through hordes of mutating monstrosities and bone-shaking boss fights.

name: BOPZ.io
description: From the creators of ZOMBS ROYALE: Play the ultimate top-down 2D shooter, BOPZ.io! Engage in intense 5v5 battles, planting and defusing bombs while outsmarting your opponents. Your role impacts your team's success, and their success shapes your experience. Prefer solo action? Go solo in various game modes that will test your skills. Jump into the fast-paced chaos and dominate the battlefield!

name: Mythfall
description: Mythfall is a free 2d browser "bullet hell" game developed by UnitOfTime.

name: Take Cover Now
description: In the early morning hours of June 3rd, 1998, modest jazz radio station WSKC intercepts an Emergency Alert - but it's not your average thunderstorm warning. Take Cover Now is an analog horror game exploring a frightening prospect: what happens when bad actors use our safety systems against us?

name: Valkyria Chronicles 4: Expert Level Skirmishes
description:
A desperate plea for help has come from the war-ravaged front lines, and Squad E has answered the call for reinforcements. Six different battlefields, each one a bleak struggle for survival—could it be that the elite Squad E has finally met its match?

This mission can be played after completing Chapter 18 of the main story. To access this mission, go to Book Mode > Menu > Extra Stories.

name: Bubble Seahorse Adventure
description:
Bubble Seahorse Adventures began its life in 2007, when a collective of developers calling themselves The Old Battleaxe decided to enter the PyWeek game jam.

The game was originally known as Barbie Seahorse Adventures, before temporarily being renamed Bubble Kong for its submission to PyWeek. After the game jam, Hassey and company decided to polish up the game with, in Hassey’s words, “a bazillion bug fixes, about 10 new levels and all the lousy levels removed” to create a release initially known as Bubble Kong Deluxe before switching back to Barbie Seahorse Adventures.

name: The Little Tales Of Alexandria
description:
The Little Tales Of Alexandria is a retro short story driven exploration game for Gameboy and Analogue pocket. Staging inside the apartment block Alexandria, featuring 15 plus different apartments all with their own tale to tell.

Talk to the tenants, and interact with almost ANYTHING and EVERYTHING in and out of there homes, including cats!

name: Totally Normal Day
description: Yep, just a normal day. Nothing weird is going to happen at all.

name: Minute Marriage
description:
Decide whether to marry your match in just a minute in the popular reality show - Minute Marriage! Ask questions to find out more about your matches' past and learn the truth behind the rose colored glasses.

Will you have a happy wedding? Or will it end in divorce?

Remember, the whole world is watching...

name: Pyramid Solitaire
description: Use the cards from the deck and cards from the pyramid to make pairs. You can only cycle the deck three times, so be careful you don’t run out of moves and lose the game!

description: Scale the mountain, overcome obstacles, and climb to victory!

description: Are you ready to leave your mark on the future?

description:
Dragon Slayer, the fifth installment in the Dragon Slayer series, continues to enjoy enduring popularity.
Embark on an adventure into a world of swords, magic!

description: Sin descripción

name: Fit My Zoo
description: Help wacky animals to relax in the pool by matching them on the floatie!

name: Octopath Traveler + Octopath Traveler II Bundle
description: Two HD-2D RPGs from SQUARE ENIX’s Team Asano, OCTOPATH TRAVELER and OCTOPATH TRAVELER II are now available as a bundle! This series features distinctive HD-2D graphics that combine pixel art with 3D.

name: From Space: Resistance Bundle
description: From Space is a solo and co-op action-shooter for squads up to four players. Take on the challenge of liberating the earth from an alien infestation with your friends, using over-the-top weaponry in a post-apolcayptic world with awesomely stylized graphics. The apocalypse has never been so much fun!

name: Mind's Decent Bundle (Darkwood + The Gap)
description: The bundle that will challenge your grip on reality.

description: Collection of awesome, family friendly games! Dive into it, play solo or together with other players!

description: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy & Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy!

name: Hogwarts Legacy: Onyx Hippogriff Mount
description:
This includes: the Onyx Hippogriff Mount.

Hogwarts Legacy is an open-world action RPG set in the world first introduced in the Harry Potter books. Embark on a journey through familiar and new locations as you explore and discover magical beasts, customize your character and craft potions, master spell casting, upgrade talents and become the wizard you want to be.

Experience Hogwarts in the 1800s. Your character is a student who holds the key to an ancient secret that threatens to tear the wizarding world apart. Make allies, battle Dark wizards, and ultimately decide the fate of the wizarding world. Your legacy is what you make of it. Live the Unwritten.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: AcceleRacers Free Pack 3
description: From Team Teku, please welcome Battle Spec: created to impress with its beauty and its speed, it's ready for any battle on the track. While Jack Hammer from Team Metal Maniacs team stands out for its asymmetric wheels, hammering his opponents with star performances.

name: Neon Doctrine's Greatest Hits Vol. 1
description: Lost Castle, The Legend of Tianding, and Yuppie Psycho. Three different games with almost nothing in common. Nothing that is, except they all captured your hearts.

name: Our Field Trip Adventure + More Missions Pack Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Party Party Time 2 + Duo Pack Set
description: Sin descripción

name: The Ghost X: Sniper Simulator - Arsenal Expansion
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocket Car: Wheel Rim Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Geminism
description: Two pairs of twins war for love, life, and limb beneath the curtain of a dark Tokyo night. From the artisans at CRAFTWORK comes a visual novel lush with art, action, and mystery; a story of GEMINISM—deformity and divinity.

name: Ancient Demon Shadow
description: Set in a vibrant and diverse otherworld, players will navigate through intricate puzzles, collect experience points, and train themselves to become stronger. Utilizing a variety of weapons and magic, they must eliminate massive creatures and monsters.

name: Omusubi
description: One day, Hinako, a high school student, finds her path to school transformed into the Sanzu River, where she meets a strange-looking man named Issa. Will she be able to get through the mysterious devices of the mysterious mansion and return safely to her family?

name: Get Tilted! :)
description: Tilt and jump your way out of the depths of a grand city. A difficult game where falling is your biggest obstacle, get used to starting over. Don't get too tilted :)

name: Multiplayer Wizards
description: Multiplayer Wizards - Bad Dudes are attacking the magic school. You and Your wizard student friends must take out ALL Evil creatures and Save the day.

name: Bump
description: Engage in fast-paced cyberpunk multiplayer arena combat. Utilize normal/charged shots, jumps, dashes, bullet time, and wall climbing for strategic advantage to push your enemies out of the arena and win the game.

name: Penguin's Road
description: Penguin's Road is a fast and fun 3rd-person action shooter. The player is given an arsenal of weapons and tools to defeat enemies that attack from the land, the sea and the air. The game rewards improvisation: run-and-gun, cover-to-cover, long aim, short blast, hand-to-hand or commandeering tanks!

name: Meta Pong
description: IT'S DEMON TIME!

name: Cadoom
description: Be a true warrior in this FPS doom clone game. Destroy evil enemies and find cakes at every level to finish game

name: Starlit Stories
description: Welcome to Starlit Stories. Relax to calming music as you build and customize your dream campsite. Watch as travelers come and go, adding life to your tranquil retreat. There's no management or deadlines for you to meet. Just wind down and let your creativity flow in this cozy campsite builder.

name: Mystic Gals
description: In this adventure you play as one of three heroines. Where you must Battle, Survive, and Collect Creatures to aid you in battles. All for a chance at taking arms against an evil sorceress known as "The Great Creator". Do you have what it takes bring her evil to an end?

name: Look Back
description: Look Back is a side-scrolling platformer where you enter the mind of a man, facing yourself in a journey of self-discovery.

name: Umbra
description: Umbra is a fantasy-style game that is story-driven with Metroid-Vania style elements, encouraging world exploration and discovery. Dive into an unforgiven world and discover the secrets behind an abandoned kingdom, and its mysterious and deceiving ruler.

name: Escape Tales: The Awakening
description: “Escape Tales: The Awakening” is a haunting narrative puzzle game that plunges you into a world shrouded in darkness and mystery. Immerse yourself in a gripping tale of loss, redemption, and the echoes of a forgotten past based on the well-received escape room card game.

name: Backrooms Cats and Lava
description: Backrooms Cats and Lava is an action-platformer with puzzle elements. Help a small cave dweller escape rising lava by moving boxes to create safe paths. Remember, the floor is lava—don't step on it!

name: Lumm-e
description: Guide Lumm-e in this charming 2D puzzle game. Use your flashlight to grow mushrooms into platforms, lights, and elevators. Solve puzzles to heal the world's disease in a relaxing, game jam-winning adventure. No precision platforming required!

name: Brutal Katana
description: BRUTAL KATANA is a short, satisfying, first-person parkour action platformer about quickly slicing statues in half.

name: Loco Limbo
description: Hello, I'm Loco Limbo, waking up on an island after some crazy military experiments. Now, I can detach my own limbs and control 'em like puppets.Can I make it off this crazy island in one piece?

name: Nagi no Koi
description: A Japanese-style visual novel where two stories intersect.

name: Catto's Post Office
description: Deliver mail as Catto, the town's dedicated Postcat, while meeting new and old friends in a vibrant cozy town filled with kitty residents.

name: Pixel Golf Club
description: Pixel Golf Club is an arcade pixel golf game that lets you unwind in a delightful world of grand golfing greens. Unleash your potential, aiming for precision and speed across endless lush landscapes.

name: Illuminati Online
description: Destroy the organization aiming to establish a New World Order! Choose your race against the sinful leaders of the Illuminati: "Ball Gates, Epstein, Rockafeller." Will you join the human resistance to fight against them, or side with the Reptilian race to destroy and replace the Illuminati?

name: Shadowed Descent
description: A series of inexplicable events spread throughout the village, causing chaos and disrupting the balance, leading you to find clues using all available resources to unravel the mysteries that triggered this chaos and disorder.

name: Cats in Wonderland
description: The Queen of Hearts had a fit of rage after the Cheshire Cat refused to be her pet and ordered the capture of all the cats in Wonderland. Find them before her and prevent anything bad from happening.

name: Fields of Asphodel
description: Fields of Asphodel is a 1.3 million-word interactive novel by JJ Laurier. It's entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: Jam Jump
description: Jam Jump is an action-platformer adventure where you guide a young knight through challenging trials, battling hordes of enemies, and navigating treacherous islands with agility and skill.

name: Finn JRPG
description: Turn-based traditional RPG in a low fantasy setting. Grind mobs for gold and gear in a setting based on old Finnish mythology.

name: Bump in the Night
description: You are trapped in a terrible dream. Observe your surroundings carefully and discern whether you are truly in your own home, or if you are experiencing a waking nightmare.

name: Break Games
description: In need of a small break while streaming? Launch a break game and let your community defend your stream from an alien invasion or get them riled up with an exclusive giveaway game! Break Games offer fun games to engage your community while you are on a short break!

name: Happy Souls
description: Happy Souls is an action Metroidvania with puzzle elements reminiscent of old Zelda games. Navigate through two worlds filled with challenging puzzles, fearsome traps, and majestic enemies. Collect keys to advance and defeat the great dark evil lurking in hell.

name: Stuntboost
description: Race against time on tracks of cardboard and toys to break records, climb leaderboards and become the fastest skater your online-neighborhood has ever seen!

name: M.I.N.S.K.
description: In a world on the brink of extinction, survivors hide from a toxic fog. Control a robot explorer, delving into abandoned cities to find essential survival resources

name: 1 AM Moscow Time
description: A 2D adventure about rescuing magical creatures in Moscow and the role of a design bureau employee in this whole story.

name: One more!
description: Drink a mug is a clicker game where you drink a mug.

name: Rush Delivery
description: Another Zombie Survivors

name: Undead Trail: Haunting Shadows
description: Play as a lone survivor in a creepy mansion overrun by zombies. Fight, solve puzzles, and hide to stay alive. Created by a single developer, this passion project promises a top-tier horror experience.

name: Trial Traction
description: Jump onto your cross bike and drive along a trail filled with many obstacles and humps to overcome!

name: She Could Fly: Documentary Escape Game
description: Online gamer Tiger Orchid has picked up the new title 'She Could Fly: Documentary Escape Game'. You play with Tiger entering an empty flat covered in comic book art. Who lives here? What's up with the creepy knitted birds? How do you get out? Will someone fix the toaster?

name: Cat Apocalypse
description: Third person shooter with cats, as support pets of a Templar Special Force squad. Play as a cat and as an American soldier in this hard survival adventure!

name: Build A Friend
description: Build A Friend is a runner and a management adventure. In the runner, you create a robot following the sample on each level. Each time you should choose the right door to win at the end of a level. At the factory, you manage repair slots and upgrade them to fix damaged robots.

name: Mega Giga Cookie Destroyer TD
description: Get ready for an epic pixel art showdown ! Dive into the heart of tower defense chaos as you battle against scrumptious calorie-packed enemies, all on massive, sprawling maps. With an extensive arsenal of towers at your disposal, it's time to defend against the ultimate sweet tooth invasion!

name: Gay Sex Adventures: Episode 8
description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD GRAPHICS and realistic-looking characters. Tony and his two assistants head to a meeting downtown, determined to secure a new office space for the company. Will they find a way to sway the current owner in their favor?

name: Space Trail Fireworks
description: Drag trails, make explosions, survive as long as you can! Space Trail Fireworks is a fun arcade-like, snake-like that is easy to learn. Best on touchscreen or with mouse.

name: Magic City Detective: The Carnival Begins - Collector's Edition
description: The clouds are gathering, and an evil spirit threatens the delicate balance. Only you can protect the secrets of the Others and resist the forces of evil!

name: Sea of Radiation: Ready
description: You will play an ordinary fish that accumulates radiation and mutates in a sea area flooded with nuclear pollution. Attacking and devouring is the only way for you to grow. Defeat other monsters and eventually become the sole overlord of this ocean.

name: Space Gray X
description: Space Gray X is a side-scrolling bullet-hell action game where you battle alien invaders, starting from Earth and advancing into space, unlocking advanced aircraft to aid your mission.

name: Sarah's Adventure: Time Travel
description: This game unearths the essence of adventure by combining elements of exploration and puzzle-solving. The game’s appeal lies in its interactive gameplay mechanics, where your choices dictate the progression of the story.

name: Ghost Party
description: Open world RPG inspired by Dungeons & Dragons and Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney. Explore, fight, gather evidence and solve mysteries in a fantasy realm of ghosts & magic. Choose how you Interact with the world & its inhabitants. Fight or logically reason your way out of a battle. The choice is yours.

name: Sus Virus Amogus
description: Sus Virus Amogus is a sci-fi action-roguelike game. A lost scientist on an endless space station battles hostile soldiers and robots, using random weapons with unique effects to progress deeper into the station.

name: Drag and Drop Medieval
description: Drag and Drop Medieval is a medieval-themed puzzle game where you move characters with your mouse through over 20 challenging levels featuring unique mechanics and pixel art graphics.

name: Colorpicker
description: Party game alone or with friends, grab, hit objects, or push your opponents to get the highest score and become the grand winner!

name: Elfie
description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to have an elephant the size of a softball as a friend? Elfie is a hybrid genre game that answers just that! Enjoy the company of your new rotund friend and partake in her hobbies represented by a collection of minigames.

name: Heart Clicker
description: Heart Clicker is a free-to-play clicker/idle game where you start with nothing and build your way up to a vast collection of hearts! Click to generate hearts, invest them in powerful upgrades, and watch your heart count soar.

name: Nexus Rumble: The Ultimate Showdown
description: Welcome to Nexus Rumble, the ultimate showdown where champions clash in a fierce competition for survival! Prepare to embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through diverse landscapes and exhilarating challenges in this heart-pounding multiplayer extravaganza.

name: Break the Empire
description: A straight forward, action-rougelite game. No lore, no story, no choices other than how to build your character and how to kill/conquer. Permadeath, unique builds, wild combinations and high replayability!

name: Spire Horizon Online
description: Enter Aetheria in Spire Horizon Online, an MMORPG where players become resurrected skeleton warriors. Choose from various classes, battle numerous monsters, and explore diverse regions. Will you save Aetheria?

name: Spyrit Walker
description: A Weird Western world trapped in a perpetual night. You must fight to survive, rescue strange characters, unlock powerful weapons and abilities in hopes of ridding this land of EVIL. Explore the open world and complete objectives in any order you like alone or in CO-OP as a SPYRIT WALKER!

name: Temple of Lily
description: In the ancient Temple of Lily a powerful Necromancer has risen from the shadows, seeking to destroy the sacred land. Defend the temple from the evil forces of the Necromancer. Build towers infused with the pure energy of Lily to fend off the relentless waves of undead creatures.

name: Mordfield Command
description: Mordfield Command: a sci-fi turn-based strategy where humanity's fate hangs in the balance. Build an army and command forces to shape humanities future. Lead the resistance to victory or succumb to the control of AI overlords in this tactical, combat-focused 4X.

name: Exorcist Onmyoji
description: This is a light puzzle game where you play as Onmyoji characters "Yang" and "Yue" to exorcise spirits from a mansion. Enjoy immersive, eerie puzzles without any fear!

name: The Beyond Of Fears: New House
description: Focuses on the mysterious events surrounding a woman trying to build a calm and peaceful life in the absence of her husband.

name: Blonsters
description: Blonsters is a fast-paced Roguelite FPS with an emphasis on run variation and randomization. Use high-powered weapons and perks to battle your way through hordes of randomized creatures in unique environments as you slay deadly bosses to claim victory.

name: Slime Survivors
description: 《Slime Survivors》 is a casual bullet heaven game, where you can indulge in mowing down enemies in the monster-infested ocean, collecting rewards, and upgrading weapons to become a terrifying killing machine in this fantastical realm.

name: BrainZ Defender
description: Unleash chaos in BrainZ Defender, the ultimate tower defense FPS! Freeze, burn, and electrocute hordes of relentless zombies with deadly traps and weapons. Strategize your defenses, protect the Brain, and survive the undead apocalypse as you fight to secure humanity's future!

name: Synthaar
description: Synthaar is a game where Life Simulation meets Grand Strategy. Create your legacy, build your home, business, base and beyond, and accumulate power and wealth to ensure your descendants have a prosperous future under your care.

name: Dead Blue Rose
description: A multiplayer horror where you escape a laboratory at the cost of others.

name: Sound Horizons
description: Score unique melodies in this minimalist rhythm game. Experience a dynamic music that reacts to your actions, and try to survive until the end.

name: Curiosmos
description: Curiosmos is a whimsical cosmic sandbox game where you build your own solar system by hand, crafting planets, moons, gravity, atmosphere, and even life! Embark on a quest to discover the secrets of the universe!

name: NebuLeet
description: A tactical auto-battler with programming: design and program combat vessels, research new technologies, colonize planets, and defeat enemies in space and on planets!

name: We Heist Too
description: Welcome to the city of Rywadorium! Explore the unique regions of the city and pretend you're a regular citizen with no illegal intentions. Enter people's homes without permission and immerse yourself into a role of a thief in a unique setting of atomic 1960s fiction, at this regular day at 'work'.

name: Dungeon World
description: Dungeon World mixes roguelike and sandbox elements while keeping simple gameplay and retro style. Explore procedural worlds, plan your journey, make a family, modify the lands, get old and reincarnate with more world knowledge.

name: Welcome to Everdell
description: Build your perfect make-believe city in the digital adaptation of the beloved family-friendly board game!

name: Elementers
description: Level-up, unlock new abilities and elements to equip and try out in Co-op Pve Missions or Pvp.

name: The Monastery
description: Do you miss classic survival horror games? Here you will find a classic mansion, riddles, a mysterious atmosphere and references to the good old games.

name: Predictile
description: Predictile" is a unique twin-stick shooting game where the trajectory of enemy attacks is displayed. Overcome waves of randomly placed enemies using skill and the power of prediction lines.

name: Dreamians: Card Battle
description: Dreamians: Card Battle is a Roguelike Deckbuilder with creatures that can evolve and change the course of battles unexpectedly. Play with one of the 3 main characters and face epic battles using over a hundred cards to save the dream world.

name: Ore no Yome VR
description: Have sex with your cute girlfriend in VR! You can create the bride of your choice with a wealth of customization elements! The left and right controls can be switched and can be operated with one hand!

name: Pin Zhi
description: Meet Pin Zhi, Bhutan's journey towards the game industry. Pin Zhi tells the story about 7 individuals who wants to show the world the beauty of Bhutan. Join Pema, a young, brave and compassionate individual in a journey to recover the lost magical harmonious friends.

name: Just A Dream
description: "just a dream" is a realistic first-person walking simulator in the style of a body-cam, presenting a psychological horror experience based on the aesthetics of liminal spaces.

name: GalaxIverse II
description: Brace yourself for explosive space battles in GalaxIverse II! This intense multi-directional shooter puts you in the pilot's seat against alien fleets and colossal capital ships.

name: Dysarmia
description: An intergalactic RPG full of love and animals.

name: Dead Zone Defense
description: Destroy hordes of zombies in the company of friends or alone.In this dynamic shooter with a top view, you have to build a base, come up with strategies, improve your weapons and buildings. There is only one goal - to destroy them all.

name: Heros Survival
description: Heroes Survival is a shooting roguelike game where you become a hero, grow and survive by hunting monsters. Become the strongest hero among players by creating various builds using various skills, weapons, and items!

name: Unity-chan the SharpShooter!
description: A casual sports TPS that can be played using only the mouse! Let's try clay pigeon shooting, rifle shooting, and rail shooting with Unity-chan!

name: Cube Arena
description: Ever wanted to play Legue of Legends or DOTA but in First person mode? Now you can! PVP with your friends or Co-op with them against Bots. Also you can play it on Oculus Quest by downloading it in meta store

name: Farm Chores
description: Farm chores is a 3D FPV item search game, where you find yourself on a mysterious farm, surrounded by lush green fields and ancient trees. Your goal is to escape, but the path to freedom is not so simple. Your task is to collect keys, notes, and food to overcome all obstacles and break free.

name: Finch
description: This game is about finding mistakes by comparing the correct room with the wrong room. There are 6 stages in total, and each stage has 10 mistakes!

name: Politics The Game
description: Become a parliamentarian, create a powerful party, and lead it to victory in this humorous RPG. Manage your popularity and dignity, use unique powers, and navigate a storyline inspired by current events.

name: Swarmsign
description: Protect your small off world farm from a variety of oversized and hungry alien bugs. Gain access to a varied assortment of weaponry and equipment designed for high caliber pest control. Bring a friend or two for added firepower.

name: Grid Ranger
description: A shortform heart-pounding shmuplike. Level up your mouse dexterity and see what lies beyond the grid...

name: Guns & Bots
description: Fight unstoppable robot horde on the arena, survive, unlock new gears, weapons and characters. Test your skill!

name: Doll Grabber
description: "Doll Grabber" is a casual puzzle game that simulates a claw machine. Players need to grab a specified number of dolls in each level. Come and challenge yourself!

name: Runner
description: A speedrunning platformer. Run, jump, and slide to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Wandering Petal
description: Explore an emerald forest as a flowery nymph. Collect flora, jump platforms, and stumble into the inhabitants.

name: Double Play
description: "Double Play" is a visual novel for adults only. A young slacker named David moves into his late grandmother's house, where he meets the charming female neighbors, but one innocent prank turns his life upside down.

name: Get off Work
description: After coming home from work, the usual atmosphere is different. Suddenly, someone appears and starts giving you terrifying and strange tasks.

name: The Hole Town
description: To the town in the hole... a story about a place where I can't go.

name: Ulia Chronicles
description: Ulia Chronicles is a city-building game set in a fantasy universe. Build your city, gather resources, and make your citizens thrive. Overcome the challenges that will arise on your path both on the earthly and spiritual plane.

name: HeavensSea
description: HeavensSea is a turn-based strategy game with a tabletop game style. Players build and strengthen their air fleets to compete for control of various island regions against enemies. Each region has different defense facilities, so players must choose suitable aircraft and firepower to deal with them.

name: Hazardous island
description: It is an adventure first-person shooter with an open world and RPG elements. Created by one person

name: Naus
description: NAUS is a thrilling 2D action roguelike that takes you deep into a dark dungeon for deadly battles against hordes of monsters and exciting adventures. Explore dark corridors and caves, where every step can be a challenge.

name: Omega Space
description: Ω-SPACE - The last dimension you can reach

name: World of Magic: Rise of Magic
description: Embark on an epic journey as a mage. Defend cities from threats, lead assaults on fortified walls, and master a variety of powerful spells. Upgrade your magical abilities to become the greatest sorcerer and defeat armies of both humans and mythical creatures.

name: Evil Doll
description: Evil Doll is a survival horror game, where you find yourself trapped in an abandoned house with a demonic-looking doll. With five days to escape, you must solve puzzles while evading the murderous Evil Doll. Will you survive?

name: NoteCaptor
description: "NoteCaptor" A video game lets you gain the ability to read musical notes!

name: One Night With Kawaii
description: Run and hide! Find a way out before she catches you.

name: ReThink 5
description: ReThink 5 is a Puzzle Game in a peaceful futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors to create challenging problems to solve.

name: Heart Beat Strikers
description: SLASH AND DICE in survival HACK'nSLASH ROGUELIKE! Demons are clicks away from the grave and you are clicks away from the new romance~

name: BlackHoleMaze
description: In this game, there are several young people who are very adventure and exploring.They discover a mysterious tunnel and embark on a series of fantastic adventures.

name: Goblin Hotdogs
description: Goblin Hotdogs is a cute and casual 3D Puzzle/Platformer. Explore, solve the mysteries of the universe, and collect the ultimate prize (hotdogs).

name: Dragon's Chronicles
description: This game is for maniacs who are no longer satisfied with the conventional difficulty level.

name: Valor of Battle
description: RPG RTS Active auto battler where you control your units of different classes, grow your army to defeat the oppressive Draken Empire. Cast spells in battle, strengthen your army with perks, upgrade items and enchant them with the power of the elements.

name: Angvik 2
description: Angvik 2 is an action roguelike platformer with a unique style. Explore a variety of character builds as you navigate randomized levels, each offering new combinations and surprises.

name: Unstoppable: Breakout
description: Unstoppable: Breakout is an immersive horror adventure where strategy, resource management, and courage are necessary if you want to survive. Escape the tower … if you can.

name: SkyBrew: Entropic Strategist
description: Experience entrepreneurship in a floating cloud cafe. Manage your flying cafe, customize construction, train staff, handle random events, and uncover the secrets of the commercial empire, growing from a small shop to the sky's brightest star.

name: Shooting Range Simulator
description: Run your own shooting range! Sell ammo, rent weapons, and manage upgrades to grow your business. Buy supplies online, attract customers, and aim for success. Can you build the ultimate shooting range? Find out in Shooting Range Simulator!

name: Junxions
description: Build a traffic intersection nobody has ever seen before. Use your wits to manage lanes, rails, crossings, traffic lights, and rights of way. Test it with advanced AI adapting to the rules of the road you decide on. Become a traffic engineer with the most comprehensive road tools in a game to date.

name: Doomed Stars
description: Consume the civilization of the fools who unleashed you upon the universe.

name: Fishtronomy
description: Fishtronomy is an adorable minimalistic puzzle game where you launch fish through space to form constellations and help clean up the skies!

name: Survivor in the Forest 2
description: Survivor in the Forest 2 is a 3D puzzle adventure game with clicker elements. Meet the continuation of the first part of the adventure game. You returned home, but something strange happened.

name: Neon Squad Tactics
description: An electrifying turn-based tactics experience where you, your friends and online allies work together to complete missions for the powerful corporations using a captivating holographic table, projecting part of your consciousness into a cybernetic team of heroes called 'NEON Squad'.

name: Trams, Trains & Monorails
description: Trams, Trains & Monorails is a strategic Hex tile puzzle game. Guide the development of your own city, connecting stations and districts and completing the mini goals. Watch your city come alive as it develops industries, tourism and lost motorists.

name: Soviet Zombies
description: Soviet Zombie is a thrilling and immersive zombie survival horror game that transports players back to the mysterious atmosphere of the 1980s to 1990s Soviet Union. This game offers a unique and experience as you navigate the harrowing world of post-apocalyptic horrors set in the Eastern Bloc.

name: Rainbow Valley
description: After getting lost in a blizzard you find yourself in Rainbow Valley—a strange mountain with even stranger villagers.

name: Lucy Grace
description: Embark on a chilling journey into the depths of the mind of Lucy Grace, a psychological horror indie adventure.

name: Dungeon Master
description: In Dungeon Master, you either try to escape a randomly generated dungeon as a survivor or hunt down survivors as the Dungeon Master. It's a cross-platform game where your role determines your goal.

name: Super Polished
description: Clean ‘em up, Beat ‘em up, Keep ‘em up in whatever order you see fit. Jet around with a hose, shoot worms with a shotgun, or throw bleach bombs to clean whole sections at a time. Just remember, you’re on the clock.

name: Book of Spells 2
description: Book of Spells 2 is a continuation of the first part of the adventure game. This time an even more dangerous adventure awaits you, in which new enemies and locations await you! Monsters have crept into your world from the depths and only you can stop them! Grab your staff and go on an adventure!

name: Shadows of Chroma Tower
description: An immersive first-person Dungeon Crawler RPG with heavy roguelite elements and huge bosses in an Extraction setting. Level up, learn skills on a vast talent tree, develop your profession as a harvester or crafter, discover new recipes, loot and craft your way to becoming an unstoppable fighter.

name: Sister Mermaid
description: Main character is suddenly told to transfer to girls school without explaining reason. He becomes swimming club adviser even though club captain hates him. How will his new life fare?

name: Aokaki
description: Aokaki is a fast-paced 2D platformer where you play as an isopod ronin. Explore fun and challenging levels while battling against the forces of the evil Shogun in this bug inhabited pixelart world.

name: Order Daybreak
description: Order Daybreak, an ARPG that deftly weaves post-apocalyptic resilience with sci-fi marvels and anime-inspired grace. Experience combat in full swing from a dynamic 2.5D perspective, where strategic movement and skillful play reign supreme. As an Aegis Warrior in this sheltering sanctuary, gather unique allies and stand united against the corruption that sprawls before you, seeking salvation for a world on the edge.

name: Scoopy Cereal
description: Sin descripción

name: Grimguard Tactics
description:
Grimguard Tactics is an epic, dark fantasy RPG strategy game with an expansive Hero summon and simple easy to learn turn-based tactics gameplay.

The Primorva, an ancient evil has awoken from the shadows. To free the world of Terenos you must summon and bring together its most powerful, legendary, and dangerous heroes in attempt to drive back the oncoming darkness. In battle you'll forge unlikely alliances and assemble an epic team of the greatest heroes this world has ever seen!

name: Naruto Quick Teleport
description: Sin descripción

name: State.io
description:
Welcome to State .io, the epic strategy game that lets you conquer an alternative world! In this cell battle game, you'll command your troops to capture all the states while challenging your logic and reaction time.

State .io is an abstract real-time strategy game, a tactical clash of dots, and an exciting countries takeover. Fight against armies by solving strategic puzzles to beat your rivals and expand your superiority in the world arena. Lead your army to victory in this epic battle game and become a war strategy winner!

name: Cat Crunch
description: Welcome to "Cat Crunch," a captivating match-3 game where strategy and fun come together in over 3500 levels of feline-themed puzzles. Dive into an immersive world where your goal is not only to match blocks but also to grow your adorable cat, earning combo rewards and unleashing powerful line blasters. With no timer to rush you, each move can be strategic, allowing for a more relaxed yet engaging gameplay experience.

name: Dragon Buurrp!
description:
From the olden days, the Great Dragons needed three things.
Treasures, princesses and, above all else… a super awesome tower!
Led by instinct, our newborn baby dragon set out to find a perfect tower for himself.
But the vile monsters of the tower dungeon were anticipating the dragon’s arrival…
Join our cuddly baby dragon for an adventure to conquer the tower!

name: Mecha Domination
description:
How can humanity survive in a perilous wasteland overrun by rampaging mechanized beasts?

Our once flourishing world was annihilated by colossal mechanized beasts, causing humans to be displaced wherever these beasts roamed.

For centuries, this world has been plagued by wars and massacres, until you, a valiant commander emerges.
You will lead the survivors to capture and modify beasts, train troops, form alliances, and ultimately save humanity's last remaining enclaves.

name: Kitty Keep
description: Journey to the beach for a cat-filled offline tower defense (TD) adventure! Strategize with cute cat heroes, growing your castle to thwart invaders.

name: Bounty Arms
description: From the team that brought you Editor's Choice BLADESLINGER comes BOUNTY ARMS, a beautiful, action-packed 3D adventure with simple, mobile-friendly controls. Play as Drake Mass, Goober, or Flux Helix and equip an array of loyal pets to complete quests, win bounties, and defeat epic bosses!

name: Chaos Galaxy
description: Sin descripción

name: Gelatina is Hungry
description: A hungry slime from Outer Space wreaks havoc throughout the Universe! Control Gelatina and plow through the world eating everything you can. The more you eat, the more you’ll grow. How far will your hunger take you?

name: Bike Unchained 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Isekai Dispatcher
description: Sin descripción

name: Geometry Tower
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Cooking Diary
description: Sin descripción

name: Cooking Wonderland
description: Sin descripción

name: Colorma
description: Think you've mastered the world of color? Think again! Colorma, an innovative puzzle game, challenges your perception and creativity like never before. Place color tiles, create stunning gradients and conquer intricate challenges on grids that bend and twist like a crossword puzzle. Decoys, clones and keyless levels will test your spatial reasoning and unlock your inner color wizard.

name: Vampire Legacy
description: Sin descripción

name: Amikin Survival
description: Sin descripción

name: Mythic Samkok
description: Sin descripción

name: Tell: Das Spiel zum Film
description: Sin descripción

name: Mercenaries 2: World Nearly in Flames
description:
ercenaries 2: World Nearly in Flames is a side-scrolling flash game, made to promote the Mercenaries 2 console games. In it, the player takes control of the mercenary, Mattias Nilsson, who must retrieve a client's briefcase that has been traced to Venezuela and must destroy the army in order to retrieve it. There are four stages in all, each with their own uniqueness.

The first mission is a side-scrolling platform, shooting at enemy soldiers while using grenades, flame throwers and even heavy machine guns while avoiding rockets fired from the top of the screen and faces a helicopter at the end. The second stage is a rail shooting game in a tank, shooting at enemy helicopters and tanks, gathering fuel up to continue the stage while jumping to avoid houses and boulders and fighting off a giant blimp at the end. The third stage is in the side of a helicopter, using a missile launcher to fire at enemy copters, letting more than four pass the screen will end the game. And the fourth and final level is a sniper stage, shooting the enemy soldiers at an enemy compound to lure the general out afterwards.

The gameplay has two different styles, the "Next Gen" utilizes the mouse as well as the keyboard, using the keyboard keys to move and jump and the mouse to aim and shoot. The "Old School" uses the keyboard keys to move, jump, fire and toss grenades or players can also customize their controls. There are also two game modes to play in, "Wuss" and "Insane".

name: Cosmonarchy
description: Cosmonarchy focuses primarily on increasing the maximum scale of Brood War without sacrificing the positional and tactical depth that sets it apart from other titles. The scale of Cosmonarchy, from its battlegrounds to its techtree changes, has not been seen before in Starcraft content (or even the RTS genre in general).

name: Kingdom
description: Multiplayer conquest game set in a medieval world, where the player can vassalize other players to become stronger and develop a great army and economy in order to gain the title of emperor. Players gain resources by making matches on a match-three grid.

name: The Shadow Over Cyberspace
description: Dread whispers echo across the Information Superhighway. Y2K is coming, heralding the rise of the Old Ones. With your meatspace mind unraveling, time is running out -- barter with gods, embrace the deathless aeons, or go offline permanently in this modempunk horror story.

name: Cellular City
description: Sin descripción

name: Nyo-Nin-Jima: My New Life in Charge of a Tropical Island
description: Stepping ashore a remote southern island, the protagonist’s battered spirits are soothed by the lovely Kowakame family that takes him in. However, many more unexpected surprises await him on the island...

name: Knight Fall
description: Welcome to Knight Fall, where every move is a challenge! Battle bosses as you climb through dangerous lands. Be careful; a single wrong move could mean the end of the journey. Will you beat the horrors or fall to the bosses on your daring quest?

name: DCGO
description: DCGO is a fully automated fan-made simulator for the Digimon Trading Card Game.

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend 2
description: Seiji’s “tied by fate” again, this time with a magical girl one year his senior! In part 2 of this rowdy rom-com VN series, a freak faceoff sees Seiji become Maja’s familiar—and bound by an enchanted tether to survive. Will proximity lead to love, or is he doomed to serve till the end of (his) days?

name: World Games
description: The NES port of World Games, an Olympics-style sports game with arcade-oriented gameplay.

name: Vinny Puh
description: It's a russian game where the player plays as Winnie the Pooh on his adventure to help his friend Piglet.

name: Messages From The Universe Graveyard
description: Explore a dead MMO and leave messages for other players to find.

name: Gal*Gun
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost Days 0: Queen's Dream
description: Lost Days 0: Queen's Dream is a Sci-Fi visual novel for the Sega Saturn about Io, a pilot/spy who was sent to United Europe to investigate Cornelli, meanwhile, the arrival of a skilled assassin threatens her mission.

name: ExE
description: There was a big fire at a hospital which inflicted serious damage. Touya's mother, Suzuno, fell victim to its flames. After ten years he still can't overcome his sadness. But he somehow enjoys his life with Makina, his younger sister, and Saya. One day he sees a girl who looks quite like Suzuno. He can't forget her, and goes after her. He finally talks to her and thinks she is definitely Suzuno. All of a sudden, she attacks him with smile, and he almost loses his life. But a girl with a sword appears in front of them and saves him. He doesn't know what's going on, but he thinks, "Is she still alive?" He starts to search for the truth...

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Farewell, Penacony
description:
Version 2.3 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Firefly and Jade
• New Trailblaze mission: Farewell, Penacony
• New area: The Radiant Feldspar
• New gameplay modes: Divergent Universe and Apocalyptic Shadow
• New quality of life updates
• New main event: Origami Bird Clash
• …and more!

name: Euclid's Inferno
description:
Euclid's Inferno is a fast-paced 2D shooter where math is your enemy. Play as the father of geometry, explore a hellish version of the works of ancient mathematicians, and defeat polygonal beasts as you upgrade your geometric arsenal.

Euclid has found himself trapped in a demonic version of his magnum opus The Elements and must traverse the 2D plane and fight against hordes of mathematical constructs.

Defeat enemies and bosses inspired in greek mythology and the fundamentals of mathematics.

Pick up new weapons and abilities as you venture deeper into the abstract realms of geometry and arithmetic. Launch points, cast rays and trace circles to defeat your enemies.

Become the geometer of your own worlds with the custom level editor.

name: Blobbers Run!
description: Blobbers Run! is a cute bubbly infinite runner for mobile android. Join adorable slimy characters as they set off on a journey to find their paradise - The Blob Kingdom.

name: Witch of Oblivion
description: Witch of Oblivion is a sorcerous souls-like set in an enchanting open world. Explore an ever-changing forest and wield destructive fire magic responsibly: scorch hordes of enemies and reshape the environment, but overdo it and the wild flames may cause irreversible damage.

name: Wolfhound
description: Infiltrate a mysterious Axis base in the Bermuda Triangle as one-man army Capt. Chuck “WOLFHOUND” Rossetti. Explore the deadly island and uncover the Nazi's twisted scientific pursuits while wreaking havoc on their forces and horrific creations in this sci-fi WWII Metroidvania!

name: Gravinaytor
description: Gravinaytor is a puzzle/platformer with a twist, in which you have to manipulate gravity to solve different types of puzzles and escape from gravity.

name: LEGO Horizon Adventures
description: Join machine hunter Aloy as she leads a colorful crew of heroes through the lush wilderness on a quest to save the world and learn the secrets of her past. Dive into boundless adventure, customize to your heart’s content, and take on action-packed battles solo or with friends in co-op.

name: The Thing: Remastered
description: Set after the events of the 1982 John Carpenter movie, The Thing: Remastered is a squad based 3rd person shooter, where each member of your team is equipped with a range of weapons and items to help you in your quest to destroy The Thing.

name: Cuffbust
description: Escape prison with your friends by equipping tools, evading guards, and executing your breakout plan. Destructible environments, proximity chat, a multitude of escape routes, and 20 player lobbies!

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII
description: Rule as one of many legendary leaders from throughout history. Establish your civilization, construct cities and architectural wonders to expand your territory, conquer or cooperate with rival civilizations in pursuit of prosperity, and explore the far reaches of the unknown world. Will you build an empire that stands the test of time?

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 2 - Elena
description: Sin descripción

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 2 - M. Bison
description:
M. Bison is the first DLC character for the Street Fighter 6: Year 2 Character/Ultimate Pass.

A man who resembles M. Bison, the leader of Shadaloo, who was believed to be dead. He has lost his memories, but has violent tendencies. He appears in locations related to Shadaloo, guided by Psycho Power.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 2 - Mai
description: Mai is the third DLC character in the Street Fighter 6: Year 2 Character/Ultimate Pass. The successor of Shiranui-style ninja arts. A charming kunoichi who is as dedicated to love as she is to training. Loves cooking, Japanese dressmaking, flower arrangement, and traditional Japanese dance.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 2 - Terry
description:
Terry is the second DLC character in the Street Fighter 6: Year 2 Character/Ultimate Pass.

A passionate fighter that hones his craft as he travels all over the world. Also known as the "Hungry Wolf". He came to Metro City after hearing about the opening of the Pao Pao Cafe.

name: Tears of Metal
description: Tears of Metal is a medieval hack-and-slash co-op roguelike. Carve through hordes of enemies to reclaim your island with the help of your formidable Scottish battalion. As you advance deeper into the trenches, uncover more about the mysterious Dragon Meteor and the treacherous enemy invasion.

name: Sleep Awake
description: First-person psychedelic horror set in the far future. In the last known city on Earth, people are disappearing in their sleep. Those who remain exist in a crisis of reckless experiments to keep awake. Katja must navigate depraved death cults, otherworldly forces, and the ever-present horror of The HUSH, to save herself and those who rely upon her.

name: There She Goes, Wriggle Nightbug!
description: This game is a Touhou fangame.

name: The Simulation
description: A never-before-seen horror game is the only evidence found at a crime scene. As a retired game designer hired to investigate the case, you find a hidden mode that plunges you into a rabbit hole of the unknown. As more obscure games are uncovered, cross the fourth wall of their worlds and investigate terrifying truths that transcend their own reality...

name: Project C
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita’s Rewind
description: In Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita's Rewind, the team faces off against a robotic reincarnation of the Power Rangers' long-time nemesis. Robo-Rita has conjured a portal to send herself back in time so she can finally vanquish the Power Rangers by forming an alliance with her younger self.

name: Cairn
description: Reach a summit never climbed before in this survival-climber from the creators of Furi and Haven. Climb anywhere and plan your route carefully, managing pitons and resources to survive the unforgiving Mount Kami. Discover what Aava is willing to sacrifice to achieve the ascent of a lifetime.

name: Slide!
description: Slide! is a puzzle game where you control a happy boy and have to defeat your arch-enemy Angry Man. It features 13 levels, each harder than the last, and was made for the Game Jaaj 7 game jam.

name: Wanderstop
description: From the creator of The Stanley Parable and The Beginner’s Guide comes Wanderstop, a narrative-centric cozy game about change and tea.

name: Slide!
description: An expanded version of Slide! with additional levels.

name: Battle Suit Aces
description: Lead a plucky crew against a star-consuming threat in this charming character-driven, card battling RPG. Brought to you by the creators of the award-winning Battle Chef Brigade, recruit ace pilots, upgrade their mecha Battle Suits, grow meaningful friendships and captain your personalized adventure.

name: Rogue Eclipse
description: A spacefighter for the new age. Master your piloting prowess in an epic sci-fi setting, take down swarms of starfighters, merciless armadas and colossal behemoths in a roguelike campaign that spans the cosmos. Easy to learn, tricky to master, and impossible to put down.

name: Project Dosa
description: Platform through a vibrant world in an upgradeable mech and cook delicious meals. Fight off corpos in turn based combat, discover new recipes, build up your reputation with local communities, and bond with friends and family on a journey to taste everything life has to offer.

name: Battle Aces
description:
Welcome to a fast paced and action-oriented real time strategy game where you defend your base, advance your tech and attack the enemy’s core. Battle Aces is a RTS game made for everyone, for those new to the genre or longtime fans, as well.

Customize a specific Unit Deck before each match, limited to 10 minutes, making for intense battles, full of strategic depth at its highest levels of play.

name: The Finals: Season 3
description:
Season 3 was the third season of THE FINALS. It launched on June 13, 2024, and ended on September 26, 2024. It was revealed on June 7, 2024, at Summer Game Fest. The season followed a predominately Japanese theme.

This season was sponsored by ENGIMO, introducing the all-new arena Kyoto and the tournament series World Tour, alongside OSPUZE, which sponsored the OSPUZE Expo, and DISSUN.

New content introduced in Season 3 includes:
- Arena: Kyoto
- Game Modes: World Tour, ranked Terminal Attack
- New cosmetics
- New Battle Pass
- Weapons: Recurve Bow, Dual Blades, Spear
- Gadget: Thermal Bore
- Specialization: Winch Claw
- Progression: New career levels
- Team text chat on PC

name: American Oudan Ultra Quiz
description: America Ōdan Ultra Quiz is based on the Japanese TV show of the game name. Like the original show, the game focuses on trivia questions solely related to the United States of America. Areas of knowledge include history, geography, culture, literature, sports, language, and others. The main quiz show takes place in New York and involves questions in random categories. A special travel mode allows the player to visit various locations in the USA, including notable airports, beaches, sports stadiums, and other popular travel destinations. Each of these locations has its own challenges in additional to the trivia questions. For example, in Las Vegas the player's answers are further configured by a slot machine, in Santa Fe the player is prompted to run a certain distance by rapidly pressing keys, etc.

name: New World: Aeternum
description: Aeternum is separate from the original New World but also contains everything from New World and its Rise of the Angry Earth expansion, retooled for consoles, and featuring a slew of changes and additions that go beyond what you'd expect in just an update.

name: Angel Army
description:
The first creation of Illusion, a company famous for its adult games, was a turn-based war game - with the only factor hinting at its creator's libido-flattering future being the generals of the game - all pretty girls, all from different countries.

There are three modes in the game: player vs. computer, in which the player selects any general of any country; campaign mode, in which the player progresses stage-by-stage, beginning with Japan; and two-player mode, in which the players can choose any stage from the beginning.

The gameplay itself is rather complex; as the general, the player has to protect his cities and at the same time send his army to combat the invading opponent. There is a wide variety of different units, including jets, helicopters, tanks, etc. Whenever a unit approaches an enemy unit, it can perform an attack, assuming that its weapons remain in range. Attacks are displayed as separate screens, graphically displaying the results. The player can choose to give up when it is clear that there are no chances for victory. Either way, a successful invasion of the opponent results in Game Over.

name: Battle Vision Network
description: Battle Vision Network is an online PvP Puzzle-Battler fusing cozy color-matching puzzle gameplay with deep turn-based tactics. Teams from across the galaxy vye for the ultimate championship title in fast n’ fierce puzzle battles!

name: Mossfield Archives
description: A game about building and exploring connections.

name: Petal Runner
description: Hop on your bike and join Cali & Kira as they explore the sun-soaked city of Sapphire Valley and train to become Petal Runners! Make deliveries, meet new friends, play minigames, and discover a wholesome slice-of-life story about growing up and letting go.

name: Cozy Grove: Camp Spirit
description: As a Spirit Scout on a haunted island, you’ll once again befriend and assist an unusual assortment of troubled ghostly bears in this heartwarming sequel to Cozy Grove from Spry Fox.

name: Koira
description: Save a puppy and embark on a musical, hand-drawn adventure. Journey together to the heart of a magical forest. Run from danger and discover your powers.

name: A Little to the Left: Seeing Stars
description: Seeing Stars is all about multiple solutions, with 100 stars to discover across 38 playful puzzles, and some extra cute visitors too.

name: Street Fighter
description: This port of Street Fighter features different graphics and colors than the arcade version while keeping the main gameplay.

name: Tides of Tomorrow
description: From the makers of Road 96, Tides of Tomorrow challenges you to survive the troubled ocean planet of Elynd, as well as the choices made by your friends and favourite streamers.

name: Cult of the Lamb: Unholy Alliance
description: Summoned by blood and born in corruption, a wicked new ally can join the holy Lamb in LOCAL CO-OP! Crusade through dungeons, slay heretics, build your cult, and seek new powers together... But that's not all!

name: Street Fighter
description: The Amstrad port of Street Fighter features different graphics and colors than the arcade version while keeping the main gameplay.

name: Tenjutsu
description:
In Tenjutsu, you play as a renegade yakuza hellbent on defying her former associates and loosening their grip on the Secret Garden City. Revealed at this year's Devolver Direct, this fast and fluid rogue-jutsu is the latest game from Sébastien Benard, designer of the acclaimed Dead Cells.

Four powerful crime syndicates control the city, ruling with an iron fist. To defeat them, you must master a brutal brawling system and build a diverse arsenal of weapons, upgrades, and martial arts techniques, breaking their hold on the streets in a flurry of violence.

The city is reborn as these sinister organizations fall to your fists, tackled in any order you wish. The ruined streets become vibrant and full of life, and you can spend gathered resources in shops and restaurants to help you on your quest.

Shape the city to fit your play style, unlocking new weapons, combat moves, and new areas. Just don't take too long: the longer you spend preparing, the stronger your enemies will become.

name: The Talos Principle II: Road to Elysium
description: Road to Elysium is a three-part coda that allows you to dive deeper into the world of The Talos Principle 2, reunite with beloved characters, and put your puzzle-solving skills to the test through a series of thought-provoking new stories.

name: Street Fighter
description: The Commodore 64 port of Street Fighter features different graphics and colors than the arcade version while keeping the main gameplay.

name: Possessor(s)
description:
Possessor(s) is a fast-paced action side scroller with combat inspired by platform fighters, a story told through dangerous characters, set in a deep interconnected world ready for exploration.

Play as Luca, the host, and Rehm, her less-than-cooperative counterpart, as they explore a quarantined city ripped apart and flooded by an interdimensional catastrophe. Their only hope of survival is by learning to co-exist.

Possessor(s) takes place across the interconnected sprawl of a destroyed mega-city, from collapsed skyscrapers to an abandoned aquarium, all riddled with secrets. Hauntingly beautiful 3D environments form a stunning backdrop over which hand-drawn and animated characters, and mysterious sci-fi horror action take center stage.

Choose multiple paths in an open-ended world structure as you look to uncover the truth behind the catastrophe. Meet a cast of engaging characters, each with their own heart-breaking story to follow in the aftermath of the devastation.

Gameplay is centered around tight, fast-paced platforming with a range of unique movement abilities that extends to its tense, precise, combat. Balance ground and air attacks, replete with combos and juggles as you encounter a variety of deadly enemies and challenging bosses. Find and unlock a wide array of powerful weapons and upgrades to bolster your arsenal and explore previously inaccessible areas.

name: Street Fighter
description: The ZX Spectrum port of Street Fighter features different graphics and colors than the arcade version while keeping the main gameplay.

name: Street Fighter
description: The DOS port of Street Fighter features different graphics and colors than the arcade version while keeping the main gameplay.

name: Can of Worms
description: A game about going to your yearly fishing ritual with your can of worms.

name: Sluggy's Tiny Adventure
description: Free yourself from your glass prison and kill the wizard.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Alice's Adventures Special Pack
description: Take a trip down the rabbit hole to uncover a topsy-turvy, swizzy, whirly world of psychedelic colours, maximalist décor and larger-than-life locales. Clean up Wonderland in five fantastical new levels for PowerWash Simulator.

name: Matchbox: Driving Adventures
description: Ignite your imagination and jump into your vehicle to tackle missions and win races.

name: The Act of Misdirection
description: The Act of Misdirection is a short horror story about magic both fake and real, on the stage of Victorian England. It was nominated for a XYZZY for Best Story of 2004.

name: The Big Catch: Tacklebox
description: Crack open the Tacklebox to show off your platforming prowess and fishing skills in this free prologue to The Big Catch.

name: Adagio
description: Sin descripción

name: Kava
description: Kava is a new single player experience for Red Faction with an estimated casual playtime of 2-3 hours, putting it roughly on par with the length of the Red Faction base game. Set a short time prior to the events of the Red Faction campaign, Kava casts the player in the role of Kava Xarel.

name: The Curse of Orion The Next Encounter
description: This is the ultimate training phase of your Red Faction probationary period. If you survive you will prove yourself as the chosen one to liberate Mars from Ultor when the time comes. Many miners have been sent to this realm, none ever make it back.

name: Banderas del Mundo
description:
‘Flags of the World’ is a quiz game that teaches the flags of all the countries of the world in the most fun way possible. There are 200 flags, 2 game types and 11 levels in this flag quiz game.

Each level has 20 flags and you have 20 seconds to match the flag and country in each quiz. If you choose the wrong flag, you will see the name of that flag.

name: VS Cartoon Cat
description: VS Cartoon Cat is a mod developed by Keneth YT And ToK. The mod is based on Trevor Henderson's monsters and creatures, including Cartoon Cat. The mod also has various fanmade versions of Cartoon Cat.

name: Large PonPon
description:
Our hero's girlfriend, Rurika, suddenly informs him that she is being transferred to Paris. However, after only a few months, she gives up her job and comes home; she is pregnant. Following an extremely hot argument, she leaves him without telling him where she is going.

Our hero goes looking for her and learns that she has checked into an obstetrics ward. Here at the hospital, he accidentally runs into Yukari, an old childhood friend from school. He also starts up a hot relationship with a married woman named Touri, who is staying in the next hospital room. His girlfriend really starts to get jealous of his other playmates. Will he fulfill his obligations to Rurika, or will he keep going after hot, new babes?

It is 0verflow's debut work and most characters belong to the core families of 0verflow's works.

name: TheExit8NYC
description:
In this first-person game, you are trapped in an endless underground passage.
Carefully observe your surroundings to reach “Exit 8”.
