Do not neglect any anomaly, floor 0 is a model without any anomaly, look at all the objects carefully.

If you find any anomalies (object different from the floor 0), turn around immediately this will take you to the next floor.

If you don't find any anomalies, go ahead to go up one floor.

If you make a mistake you will start again from floor 0.

Your objective is to exit via exit 8.

move using the wasd keys
You will find various options such as volume, mouse sensitivity and several graphics options in the "ESC" menu.

name: Zodiac XX Leo
description: Zodiac XX: Leo is an explosive underwater arcade piloting sci-fi and political drama reimagined from our 2020 Humble Trove release “Zodiac XX”. Suit up and take command of the elite ZODIAC squadron and dive deep in high-speed ultra-manueverable “sinker” submarines, engaging in thrilling piloting action unlike anything seen in the 6DOF genre.

name: All Systems Dance
description: Automation is not the answer; DANCE is the key to disruption! Help liberate citizens of a consumption-obsessed, corporate dystopia in All Systems Dance: an expressive dance battle adventure. Connect moves, express yourself, feel the music. Join The Movement. The revolution will not be choreographed.

name: Croakwood
description: Croakwood is a creative, relaxed town building simulation game about frogs and nature! Design and create structures, plan and decorate towns, and explore an ancient forest to guide the growth of a charming community of tiny amphibians as they settle into their new life in the lush and wild woods.

name: Sandara: City of a Thousand Eclipses
description: Use your cards to roleplay in a harsh world where your home is slowly sinking into the sands. Enter the city of Sandara and build your deck, make allies, enhance your abilities, and manage your resources before the eclipse ends your life.

name: Slay the Princess: The Pristine Cut
description:
Slay the Princess is a choice-driven psychological horror visual novel with dramatic branching, light RPG elements, and hand-penciled art.

The Pristine Cut is the definitive version of the game. It features expanded content including 3 new chapters, never-before-seen Princesses, expansions to familiar routes, a new ending, over 1,200 new hand-penciled frames, over 2,500 new lines of dialogue, and over 35% more content overall.

name: Mythmatch
description: A Greek mythology community sim about bringing people together by putting things together.

name: Minecraft: Camp Enderwood
description: Welcome to Camp Enderwood, the island summer camp of your dreams...and your nightmares! Participate in parkour, archery, hide n' hunt and more to earn marshmallows and roast the elusive s'more. Beware the spooky woods and creatures in the dark as you explore and venture beyond the camp

name: Squeakross: Home Squeak Home
description: In Squeakross: Home Squeak Home, solve and transform puzzles into furniture to decorate the perfect home for your rodent friend. Collect hundreds of decorations, accessories and stickers in this cozy game full of charm!

name: Critter Café
description: Welcome to your Critter Café! Seek out fantastical Critters in need of your help and build a new home together. Renovate your café, bond with your Critters, and uncover the secrets of mysterious portals to give every Critter a cosy home.

name: Ila: A Frosty Glide
description:
Set foot on a magical island and immerse yourself in a whimsical small open world as ILA, a spirited young witch-in-training with her trusty skatebroom. Explore, find secret places, collectables, and improve your magic and flying abilities as you make your way to the summit.

Explore a whimsical small open world as ILA, a spirited young witch-in-training. Start your journey fueled by determination and your trusty skatebroom. Find secret places, collect valuable items, and improve your magical flying abilities.

Who needs a broom when you have a skatebroom? Soar through snowy mountains and enchanted forests, feel the wind as you cross stunning landscapes. Master and upgrade the magic of your to soar higher and farther.

Explore ILA’s small open world at your own pace and relax. Find hidden nooks, uncover treasures, and unlock secrets flying on your skatebroom. Each discovery rewards you with valuable items and deeper lore, enriching your magical journey.

Collect special items and coins to personalize ILA’s outfit with stylish hats, capes, and skatebrooms to reflect your unique style. As you progress, access new skatebroom upgrades to improve ILA’s flying powers.

Feel the magic and enjoy the captivating original soundtrack composed by Joaquim Scandurra (Sku), which builds up and grows with you as you approach the summit.

name: Tiny Lands 2
description: Take your perception into a new dimension with the relaxing sense of photorealistic miniature scenes in Tiny Lands 2. Find the differences and stories by exploring handcrafted 3D dioramas. Can you find them all?

name: Magical Bakery
description: Experience a life full of magic, challenges, and the joy of creating sweets that will leave a spellbinding impression on your customers. Become the ultimate magical baker and prove yourself worthy to inherit the Magical Bakery!

name: Omochapon
description: Omochapon is a little packet of fun!

name: Pretty Coo'
description:
Lost and alone in an unfamiliar town square, I guess it's time to make friends with the local wildlife!

By feeding and guiding your feathered friends, you'll overcome various obstacles to make your way back home, and maybe even cause some mischief along the way!

name: Prisma
description: This is the story of Alma, a girl that receives strange powers from an old Camera containing a magical Prism Shard, and is transported to another world alongside other Almas from different universes. Each Alma will have their own Prism Shard, and a unique vision of the world, some will be friends, other enemies and some NPCs.Bring together a party of Almas, open new quests and combos by bonding with them, and unlock different routes to prevent the reality to break.

name: Heaven Crawler
description: Heaven Crawler is an atmospheric isometric roguelite hack-n-slash dungeon crawler with RPG elements. Traverse through an ever-changing babelian structure filled with robots. Collect Helmets, Armors, Mechanical Arms and strengthen your character to ascend to Heaven and save your mother's soul!

name: Bit & Quantum: Save the Earth!
description: Bit & Quantum: Save the Earth is an interactive experience, following a pair of astronauts trying to find a way to help a planet in peril; Through hope and wit solutions can be found despite coming across unexpected challenges.

name: Naughty Geese
description: Naughty Geese is a 2D pixel art platformer. You control a biker goose who tries to keep his offspring safe from predators. As they like to escape and enjoy the scenery, Dad needs to go after his "Naughty Geese" every time. Enjoy unique gameplay that pays homage to classics of the genre.

name: The Path into the Abyss
description: "The Path into the Abyss" is a hardcore first-person open-world survival shooter set in Buenos Aires with a backdrop of cosmic horror, combat mechanics, dynamic AI, and looting.

name: Hollow Flowers
description: Sin descripción

name: Curilemu
description: Curilemu is an adventure-horror game inspired by the myths and legends of Chilean Patagonia. Immerse yourself in a haunting world filled with Lovecraftian horrors and ancient mysteries. Fight colossal beasts and discover what is behind the plague to heal this island and restore the cosmic balance.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: One-Time Dragon Pack
description: This pack grants a one-time purchase of 850 Dragon Krystals plus an exclusive Scorpion dragon palette with alternate! Use your Dragon Krystals in the Premium Shop in Mortal Kombat 1 to purchase other amazing palettes and gear. This killer deal is available once per account.

name: The Postman Shoots Twice
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Crane HD
description: Retro match 3 about a Bug juggling at his job, BUT NOW IT'S BETTER Match 3 drops to clear them, but your tool changes constantly, so watch out! Be a Bug, Do a Work, Match a 3

name: Codex: Eternal Eclipse
description: Embark on a quirky adventure with four unique main characters as they seek their truth, battling gods, colossal corporations, and bizarre foes along the way. Unravel the mystery of the Eternal Eclipse and uncover the ancient secrets of the world!

name: Kimi ga Ita Kisetsu: Primary
description:
Maejima Masaki is an aspiring photographer presented with an opportunity to study under a world famous photographer, due to a photo he took of one of the 4 Isumi sisters with whom he is close to which managed to attract attention. However, he must make a choice of whether he wishes to pursue that opportunity or not.

It became âge's debut work due to the troubled development of "Kaseki no Uta" and at the time received heavy criticism about the game system and storyline.

name: Dredge: The Iron Rig
description: Gather, craft and deliver your way through the mysteries of The Iron Rig, revisiting areas from DREDGE to investigate ancient disturbances stirring in the deep. Assist the Ironhaven Corporation in constructing facilities that unlock items, gadgets and more, but what are they truly here for?

name: Reflection by Delphinium Interactive
description:
Reflection is an 02A2 Visual Novel Game Jam Submission!

This game was made in five days by a small team.

name: Netflix Stories: Perfect Match
description: Sin descripción

name: Netflix Stories: Emily in Paris
description: Say “oui” to possibility. Follow your heart and live out your own story set in the City of Love in this interactive story based on the hit series.

name: Netflix Stories: Selling Sunset
description: Sin descripción

name: Too Hot to Handle 3
description:
This time, you're the bombshell! Crash the retreat and start drama among paired-up singles in this season of "Too Hot to Handle," the beloved dating game based on the series. More customization! Fewer inhibitions! Will you find love and romance or go for casual hookups in this dating game?

Flirt with glittering singles, get tangled up in love triangles and make fateful decisions that could have lasting consequences for your dating life. Can you abstain from getting frisky and build a true romance? Or will you succumb to infatuation? The story is in your hands. Based on the hit Netflix reality series "Too Hot to Handle."

name: Happy Bastards
description: Happy Bastards is an open-world tactical RPG with turn-based combat in which you assemble a squad of unruly mercenaries to explore, fight, and loot. Let the bastards do the dirty work while you give the orders, reap the rewards, and enjoy the high life. Who needs XP when you're famous?

name: Memory Clash
description: Memory Clash is an engaging multiplayer memory game set in a fantastical world filled with magic and mythical creatures. Players immerse themselves in an enchanting realm where they compete to uncover and match pairs of magical cards. Each turn reveals a new challenge, testing the players' memory and strategy skills as they aim to outwit their opponents. With vibrant fantasy-themed artwork and dynamic gameplay modes, Memory Clash offers an exciting and challenging experience for players of all ages. The game supports both cooperative and competitive play, allowing friends and family to enjoy the adventure together or against each other in epic memory battles.

name: Goat Simulator 3: Multiverse of Nonsense
description: In a world where everything went wrong (and it was all your fault) you must now help the guardian of the Multiverse to save it before it’s too late. This is… Goat Simulator 3: Multiverse of Nonsense

name: Eriksholm: The Stolen Dream
description:
Experience an isometric, narrative-driven stealth game set in the stunning city of Eriksholm. When Hanna’s brother, Herman, disappears and the police begin to pursue him, her search sets off a chain of catastrophic events that will not only alter their lives but also the destiny of the entire city. Join your allies, outsmart relentless enemies, and use your cunning to uncover the truth behind Herman’s disappearance — where greater powers are at play than you ever imagined.

Follow Hanna’s adventure through the vibrant streets of Eriksholm, a sprawling Nordic city inspired by the elegance and grit of early 1900s Scandinavia. In this world, every shadow offers a hiding place, and every corner hides a new challenge. Allies and quick reflexes are your greatest tools as you unravel the city's secrets and outsmart your pursuers.

name: Nikoderiko: The Magical World
description: Join Niko and Luna on their quest in Nikoderiko, a vibrant platform adventure. When the duo discovers an ancient relic on a magical island, the villainous Grimbald of the Cobring Gems Company snatches it away. To save the island and its tribes, they must navigate seven unique worlds with the help of their animal friends and defeat the Cobring army. With family-friendly design, couch co-op, and music by David Wise, Nikoderiko promises a magical, mysterious journey for all ages.

name: The Name is Dio
description:
The Name is Dio is a game in which you must survive for the most time you can!

Loot the foes!
Survive longer!
Get higher points!

name: Sinned Arena
description: Sinned Arena is a classic arena shooter inspired by timeless 90s games. You are trapped in Hell with other unfortunate souls, fighting among each other for demons twisted pleasures. Fight for your way out this dark place but beware, demons aren't there just to watch.

name: Ivor
description: A blood-pumping throwback FPS set in a Norse-inspired world. The undead have risen and Ivor, the Drengr, has awakened. Take up your axes, load your shotgun, and get to killing.

name: Mr. Flip
description: Sin descripción

name: Solomonic
description: I've made a game where you can split a baby in two. I didn't want to publish it because I feel bad about it, but people seem to like it?

name: Sonic PC Port Remake
description: The Sonic PC Port Remake is a Sonic creepypasta game created by JohnKun and JoeDoughBoi.

name: Sex Kitten Sim-Date 3
description: Our hero(you)has time to kill while your girlfriend has gone to South Korea. You now have to spend your time chatting up some nightclub chicks!

name: Sex Kitten Sim-Date 4
description: Our hero (you) is on another sexually charged quest! It is your mission to rescue Slutty McSlut from your evil ex-bitch. Prepare yourself for another crazy fan-service adventure!

name: Sex Kitten Sim-Date 2
description: Our hero from Sex Kitten Sim-Date part 1 has woken up in a daze to a new sex-crazed adventure!

name: Sex Kitten Sim-Date 5
description: You are stranded on an island due to the air port being taken over. You need to gather your resources so you can over come the threat.

name: Dishop
description:
In the year 2063, human civilization teeters on the brink of collapse as the world descends into a devastating chaos, wrought by resource scarcity, relentless warfare, and rampant pollution. However, tragedy reaches new dimensions when an unexpected event ravages the Earth.

An outlaw, sentenced to the death penalty for a series of heinous acts, emerges as his dark past intertwines with the struggle for the survival of all humanity. At the heart of the chaos, the fate of the human race is at stake in a colossal confrontation, where the indomitable will of an anti-hero challenges the relentless force of an unparalleled event.

name: Mekkablood: Quarry Assault
description: The Year is 2082. You play the role of Bill, a grizzled, and extremely hairy robojockey. It's up to you to take the reigns of Bill's Mekk, with your friend Rusty, to get your revenge against TorxCorp, who's trying to steal your mining claim.

name: Reverend
description: A retro first-person shooter inspired by Blood, Duke Nukem 3D, and Rise of the Triad. REVEREND is a dark, twisted tale with religious undertones, terrifying creature design and one hell of a personality.

name: Ashes: Hard Reset
description: Ashes: Hard Reset is the prequel expansion for Ashes: Afterglow and is a linear campaign in the style of 2063. Take the role of the veteran scav Walker as he guides a team of elite soldiers into The City. As events spiral out of control Walker finds out that a long forgotten foe has caught up with him... and that not all injuries are of the flesh.

name: Neon Rain
description: Neon Rain is a hybrid between a Metroidvania and a Boomershooter.

name: Stuck At Lv. 1
description: Stuck At Lv. 1 is a roguelike action RPG in which the player plays as a protagonist who is cursed and is unable to "level up" his vampiric abilities, and must work around this restriction. Explore the Vespera Realm, steal enemy attacks and find out the truth about your curse!

name: Meme Mayhem
description: Hurl emojis and battle the internet's biggest stars to rise as a meme master in Meme Mayhem! Collect powerful perks and relics, enjoy a darkly comic social media story, and assemble the ultimate emoji attack stack in this roguelite idle RPG.

name: Pizza Ready!
description:
Introducing Pizza Ready, the ultimate pizza restaurant simulation game!
Are you ready to become the master of your own pizza empire? This pizzeria game will immerse you in the world of a pizza shop and teach you everything about running a pizza business, from cooking and serving to cleaning and even managing staff!

Run your own Pizza Restaurant!
As the boss of a pizza restaurant, you'll be responsible for everything from making and serving pizzas to managing store and hiring

name: A Growing Adventure
description: Explore and grow a world in which a fantasy RPG adventure awaits.

name: Minecraft: 15 Year Journey
description: It’s time for a (literal) trip down memory lane! A lot has happened in these 15 years, so we’ve packed some of our most nostalgic moments, marvelous dimensions, and accidental proudest inventions from our past into a free map by Oreville Studios. The doors to the Minecraft Museum are open and admission is free, so what are you waiting for? Let’s head inside!

name: Outlanders 2: Second Nature
description:
Welcome back to the Outlands! A new, courageous generation of outlanders is ready to redefine life on the Outlands, with new aproaches to building and surviving, uncharted heights and horizons, and an ecosystem more vibrant than ever before.

Outlanders 2 is the latest installment of the charming town-builder that captivated players with its imaginative levels, easy-to-understand but hard-to-master gameplay, and offbeat humor.

name: Trials
description: Sin descripción

name: Trials Bike Basic
description: Sin descripción

name: Trials Bike Pro
description: Sin descripción

name: Trials Construction Yard
description: Sin descripción

name: Trials Mountain Heights
description: Sin descripción

name: Hidden Cats In Japanese Village
description: This hidden object game provides a relaxing experience as you search for 100 hidden cats scattered throughout a charming Japanese village

name: Rainbow Fish Goes to College
description: The Player plays the titular character: Rainbow Fish! Yes, from the children's book. Except he's all grown up and is ready to take on his first day of school. Help him survive while also peering into the life of a fish who wants to be more than the book he's known for

name: Jungle Drummer
description: Jungle Drummer is an arcade rhythm-game by International Games System CO., LTD. and Universal Space.

name: Age Maniax: Isumi Yon Shimai Saigo no Hi
description:
One day protagonist meets with four sisters, who due to certain events starts living in his house. But he has to go to Europe to follow a story, and they decide to go together with him. They make reservations in an old castle which had reports of a princess' ghost, a legendary wolf, a lake monster and a crashed UFO surrounding it. And this is not even the beginning of the events to unfold around the sisters ...

A crossover between multiple âge works, various characters from other companies games such as Hateao, PHANTOM and Pure Mail make appearance.

name: Caution Ahead: Part 2
description:
This is the second installment of a three-part series featuring a run-and-hide type horror experience, with each part consisting of three chapters.

You follow the story of John Rand, an experienced search and rescue officer stationed at Richburg National Park.

After the events of Part I, John continues his relentless search and rescue mission. He must venture further into the depths of Richburg National Park before it's too late to save both Michelle and Elena.

* Chapter 4: The search.
* Chapter 5: Run for your life.
* Chapter 6: Almost there.

name: The Fog
description: You discovered a strange place in the woods and decide to explore it. But beware, a terrifying monster roams the forest, always on the hunt. Your mission: gather 12 keys to unlock the nearby cabin and escape the creature.

name: All On Board!
description: All On Board! is a platform to play board games in VR with friends.

name: Hazing: Night Shift
description: A young police officer arrives at a country house after a disturbing call... This VHS tape captures the horrors that happened to him.

name: Fallout 76: Skyline Valley
description: Expand southward to Skyline Valley – a brand-new region of Appalachia. Investigate the cause of the electric storm circling overhead and unveil the mystery around Vault 63 and its dwellers, including a shocking new Ghoul type – The Lost.

name: Flick Kick Football Legends
description:
Kick it old school with the latest game in the Flick Kick series — tackle, pass, shoot, and more!

Flick Kick Football Legends brings Flick Kick to all new heights with more diverse on-field gameplay, team building and management, and a multi-level league structure.

Packaged in a vibrant, comic-inspired style filled with lively characters, quirky scenarios, and rich animation, you will guide your team towards a highly sought after championship win to achieve legendary status.

name: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
description: Lead the members of Expedition 33 on their quest to destroy the Paintress so that she can never paint death again. Explore a world of wonders inspired by Belle Époque France and battle unique enemies in this turn-based RPG with real-time mechanics.

name: Crisis/Divider
description: Sin descripción

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 13
description: Sin descripción

name: FragPunk
description:
FragPunk is the new free-to-play 5v5 hero shooter poised to break the rules of combat.
What makes FragPunk different is the introduction of Shard Cards that can affect the playing field for all players.
Shard Cards are voted on by players before each round and can change the entire playing field – from making player’s heads big to your team into zombies when you are downed.
FragPunk has a low barrier entry but a high-level of gunplay mechanics making it a great choice for casual gamers to hardcore FPS fans alike.

name: Winter Burrow
description: Winter Burrow is a cozy woodland survival game about a mouse returning home to restore their childhood burrow. Explore, gather resources, craft, knit warm sweaters, bake pies and meet the locals.

name: Mixtape
description:
On their last night of high school, three friends embark on one more adventure together. Play through a mixtape of memories, set to the soundtrack of a generation.

En route to their final party together, a perfectly-curated playlist draws them into dreamlike reenactments of their formative memories. Experience a variety of narrative vignettes exploring the pivotal moments that shaped them. It's the greatest hits of teenage friendship, from the first kiss to the last dance.

name: Life is Strange: Double Exposure
description: Max Caulfield, photographer-in-residence at the prestigious Caledon University, discovers her closest new friend Safi dead in the snow. Murdered. To save her, Max tries to Rewind time – a power she’s not used in years… Instead, Max opens the way to a parallel timeline where Safi is still alive and still in danger! Max realizes the killer will soon strike again – in both versions of reality. Only Max can Shift between the two parallel timelines to solve and prevent the same murder.

name: Atomfall
description: A nuclear disaster has left an area of Britain in tatters. Atomfall, a new survival-action game, will see you explore, scavenge, craft, barter and fight your way through beautifully recreated scenery in search of answers.

name: Gears of War: E-Day
description:
Experience the brutal horror of Emergence Day through the eyes of Marcus Fenix in the origin story of one of gaming's most acclaimed sagas.​
Fourteen years before Gears of War, war heroes Marcus Fenix and Dom Santiago return home to face a new nightmare: the Locust Horde. These subterranean monsters, grotesque and relentless, erupt from below, laying siege on humanity itself. ​
Built from the ground up with Unreal Engine 5, Gears of War: E-Day delivers unprecedented graphical fidelity.

name: DieFeen
description: Sin descripción

name: Hit The Beat
description: Hit The Beat is a drum-style rhythm game that features bright & colorful graphics with a premise that is easy to approach, Unlike other drumming games, the player is not presented with drum-pads – instead there is a multi-color lit dome with a cartoon enemy drawn on it. Hit any part of the dome to coincide with the approaching notes and your character on screen will slash them away. Also instead of standard drumsticks, either of the players uses a set of sponge sticks to dish out the beats. Complete the song for the boss battle at the end of the level!

name: Advanced Thinking Skills
description: Sin descripción

name: Parity Shot Integral
description: Sin descripción

name: Marvel vs. Capcom 2: New Age of Heroes
description: The Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 versions of Marvel vs. Capcom 2 features Online Multiplayer as well as widescreen support with optional graphics filter for smoother or crisper visuals.

name: Marvel vs. Capcom 2: New Age of Heroes
description: The iOS port of Marvel vs. Capcom 2 introduces a new feature called Variable System that allows the player to tag in other team members at any time.

name: Among the Wild
description: Among The Wild is a first-person farming game where you wrangle fantastical creatures, build and manage your own idyllic farm, and set out to explore uncharted corners of a strange universe.

name: Star Birds
description: Star Birds is a cheerful asteroid base-building and resource management game. Discover and mine countless asteroids, create production networks and guide your colony of spacefaring birds to new interstellar horizons!

name: Lorn Vale
description: A free-roaming post-apocalyptic Survival Sandbox RPG in which you must weather the unrelenting brutality of a dying world. Shape your own unique journey, forge alliances. Make difficult choices in this systems-driven game full of procedurally generated events. Amidst the ruins, your story begins.

name: Ale Abbey
description: Build and expand your monastery, craft recipes and brew holy ales in this unique brewery tycoon. No pre-made recipes in Ale Abbey, oh no. It's a canvas for true beer alchemists. It's as simple as: brew, sip, repeat. Welcome to Ale Abbey!

name: Devyat' princev Ambera
description:
Devyat' princev Ambera is an adventure game based on Nine Princes in Amber (1970), the first novel from the Chronicles of Amber series by Roger Zelazny. It follows the adventures of Carl Corey, who wakes up in a hospital with amnesia, escapes and starts searching for answers. After a while he discovers his true identity, his mission and a fantasy world hidden from the eyes of mere mortals. A lot of work has to be done.

The gameplay is linear and consists of several loosely connected elements: a simple point-n-click adventure, a number of quick-time events and 9 stand-alone puzzles. The story is told through dialogs that follow the text of the novel closely. The game comes with 2D hand-drawn characters and pre-rendered backgrounds.

name: Sumerian Six
description: Lead an unlikely team of commando scientists behind enemy lines to fight Nazis, uncover arcane mysteries, and wield experimental technology to turn the tide of WWII in this real-time tactical stealth adventure.

name: Down the Shaft
description: Down the Shaft is a first person horror game where you take on the duty to keep an Elder God forever contain within the cave. In order to do that, you must keep the machines that maim them active. But beware, their minions are on the loose and they won't let you do your job so easy.

name: Copa City
description: Organize high-stakes football events in the first football tycoon! Get the urban space and the stadium ready, ensure safety, and provide fans with an amazing football fiesta! But stay alert: Your decisions will not only influence the city but also the emotional rollercoaster for football fans!

name: Tempopo
description: Tempopo is a contemplative puzzle game of planning and execution. Guide your Tempopo to rescue musical flowers across imaginative sky islands and arrange them in your own melodic garden. Take your time placing instructions and watch the harmonious or hilarious results of your decisions.

name: Little Critters 2
description: Embark on an epic journey in "Little Critters 2," where survival and adventure intertwine in a captivating world filled with vibrant landscapes and unpredictable challenges. As the latest installment in the beloved Little Critters series, this game takes you on a thrilling adventure like never before.

name: I Am Your Beast
description: I Am Your Beast is a shortform covert revenge thriller FPS about getting hunted across the North American wilderness by the military-industrial complex--and turning the tables.

name: Crescent County
description: Crash headfirst into this witch-tech open world, drifting and driving on the back of your new motorbroom. Make deliveries, trick out your broom, and race your new friends (and crushes) as the sun sets. Decorate your flat, sort your life out, and discover what it means to find home.

name: Generation Exile
description: You are aboard humanity’s first and final generation ship, a last-chance expedition now teetering on the rim of collapse. One step at a time you must rebuild society and the ship’s fragile ecosystems — using only what you brought with you — in this turn-based narrative city-builder.

name: Adventure II
description: An expanded version of the original Colossal Cave Adventure written by by Peter Luckett and Jack Pike that adds news areas and increases the max score to 440 points. While the original, complete source code is thought to be lost, a modern reconstruction, known as Adv440, was developed by Mike Arnautov in 2001, compiled in Perl based on the Fortran66 code that was still available.

name: Hotel Galactic
description: Hotel Galactic is a cozy management game inspired by Studio Ghibli's classic pictures. Build the tourist destination of your dreams, oversee and unite your staff to forge a quirky family, and make new friends as you explore this wholesomely nostalgic world.

name: Phoenix Wright: Legends of Liability
description:
In an unexpected turn of events, Redd White is your client to protect his company, Bluecorp, from a class action lawsuit. In his most difficult case yet, Phoenix Wright has one job to do: To actually read Bluecorp's TOS (Terms of Service).

Explore Bluecorp's headquarters by examining areas and talking to employees, uncovering many dark secrets as you solve the mystery behind one of the biggest lies in the industry.

name: Streets of Fortuna
description: Use your wits to survive the generated chaos that is living in the Streets of Fortuna. A free-roaming sandbox game about growing from street rat to a tradesman, a priest, a smuggler, an alchemist, a spy, or perhaps someday a leader to rival the Overlord.

name: Phoenix Wright: Turnabout Cuddles!
description:
It's your first day as a new recruit at the Wright Anything Agency!

But just as you're settling in, someone gets murdered! It's up to you to solve the case, and maybe find love if you have the time!

name: Stormforge
description: Stormforge is an open-world survival crafting game for up to 8 players. You are Stormforged, with the ability to brave and harness power from magical storms. Explore, fight, forage, craft, build, and defeat bosses in this epic, fantasy game. Survive the Storms and thrive!

name: Gunboat God
description: Become the all-powerful Gunboat God in this fluid shoot 'em up. Carve the waves as you stylishly fight hordes of monsters in hundreds of quick-fire missions. Transform your Gunboat and upgrade your weapons, skills and abilities to take on giant, challenging, multi-stage bosses!

name: Ace Attorney: The Dark Age of Love
description: A VN based around the nice lawyers of the Ace Attorney games.

name: Athena Cykes: Ace Attorney - Trials of time.
description: Two years after what happened in Khura'in, Athena Cykes - an attorney, encounters a bunch of strange cases, with her ex co-worker: Apollo, being in Khura'in, and her boss - Phoenix Wright's sudden dissapearance, she has to solve the cases on her own, discover all the mysteries, and find out how they are all connected. And also find her boss. Will she do it? I don't know, that's for you to find out.

name: Phoenix Wright: Hidden Traces
description: "Phoenix Wright - Hidden Traces" is a German fan game for the well-known Ace Attorney series for the NDS. This part takes place between the second (Justice for all) and the third (Trials and Tribulations) and tells a completely new story. The player once again takes on the role of Phoenix Wright, a criminal defense lawyer who has to deal with a wide variety of cases and people.

name: Adventure 3
description: A software port and expanded fork of the original Adventure by Dave Platt written in PL-6 for Xerox Scientific computers running the CP-V operating system.

name: Phoenix Wright: Comeback & Turnabout
description: Phoenix Wright: Comeback & Turnabout is a fan game developed by Squall for the Ace Attorney game series and takes place chronologically after the official second part of the series (Justice for All).

name: Mahjong on the Beach
description: Sin descripción

name: Is this Game Trying to Kill Me? Preface
description: This is a small free prequel to the Is this Game Trying to Kill Me?. An old cabin deep in the dense forest, a strange computer, and a game that's trying to kill you!

name: Space Junk Scavenger
description: Repair your spaceship by salvaging parts off shipwrecks nearby.

name: Fortnite: Rogue Alias Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventure4+
description: Original developed as a stand alone expansion by Mike Arnautov, the project would eventually merge previous forks on the Adv440 and Adv550 all together into a superset with features of all three. Superseded by the later Adv770 but can still run on modern system through an A-code interpreter.

name: Non Stop Driver
description: If you slow down you die, if you speed up you live!

name: Injustice: Containment Suit Doomsday
description: Sin descripción

name: Adv770
description: Sin descripción

name: Backpack Survivors
description:
A crossover between bullet heaven and inventory management. In Backpack Survivors the player fills his backpack with weapons and items which are then used during the bullet heaven portion of the game. During this, the player will kill hordes of enemies and keep upgrading their backpack to grow stronger and even defeat bosses.

Backpack Survivors has roguelite elements with unlockables and a large talent tree, allowing the player even more customizability over the game.

Backpack Survivors is currently in Alpha and is slated for a release into Early Access in late 2024.

name: Panel no Ninja Kesamaru
description: Panel no Ninja Kesamaru is a Puzzle game, developed by SAS Sakata and published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: Asteroid Dodge
description: An arcade style game where you have to dodge lots of asteroids in order to be first in the world leaderboard.

name: Soulkin
description: Soulkin is a tactical roguelite game blending strategic monster-collecting and turn-based combat. As the summoned heroine, Nadia, you’ll harness the power of Souls to bond with magical creatures and lead them against the encroaching corruption threatening Ankiril.

name: Primado Reig 103
description:
This game adapts a real story that is happening right now (June 2024) in the building of Primado Reig Avenue number 101-103, in Benimaclet, Valencia, Spain.

But if it weren't about that building, I could go on any other.

name: Kingdom Hearts Integrum Masterpiece
description: Experience the full story of KINGDOM HEARTS! The journey begins in KINGDOM HEARTS -HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX- as Sora, Donald, and Goofy battle the Heartless, making friends and having spectacular adventures along the way. The story culminates in KINGDOM HEARTS III + Re Mind, where our heroes take on tremendous challenges and persevere against the darkness threatening iconic Disney and Pixar worlds.

name: Pyramid
description: This is a short vapowave/horror first person adventure, completion time is around 10 minutes. It is inspired by Control, Severance and my experience working in a business corporation, so if you're into these things, you might enjoy this game too. This is the first part of a bigger experience, the following parts will come soon.

name: ChromaGun 2: Dye Hard
description: Shoot paint, mix colors, and solve puzzles in this adventure about friendship and redemption. Just don't enter that portal to another universe, and everything will be perfectly fine.

name: Deathwish Enforcers: Special Edition
description: A gritty, non-stop blood bath from the creator of Insanity's Blade, Super Battle Princess Madelyn and the recently released GuardGrave. And a parody of beloved 60s and 70s classic action films, heroes and villains. Deathwish Enforcers... There's gonna be hell to pay!

name: Malcatras' Maiden
description: uhh super power battle maid.. the girls are so stupid becuase they are too gay.. puppy girl barfs in her childhood flashabck becauyse she needs mommy so bad.. yea gothic horror! or psychosexual thriller...? yes, this is malmaid

name: Extra Ordinary
description: Short retro-inspired game based on Extra Ordinary (2019) a supernatural horror-comedy film directed by Mike Ahern & Enda Loughman. You play as Rose, a (mostly sweet and mostly lonely) Irish small-town driving instructor, who must use her supernatural talents to save the daughter of Martin (also mostly sweet & lonely) from a washed-up rock star who plans to use her in a Satanic pact to reignite his fame.

name: Nothing Door
description:
A puzzle game from a dark dimension.

The Nothing Door is your only escape. But the door is fickle. It lets nothing through... except you. Where will it lead you?

name: Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Upgrade
description:
Unlock the Expansion Pass and exclusive cosmetic content with the Alan Wake 2 Deluxe Upgrade

Alan Wake 2 Deluxe Upgrade includes:
- Expansion Pass
- Night Springs Expansion (additional story content)
- Lake House Expansion (additional story content)
- Nordic Shotgun Skin for Saga
- Crimson Windbreaker for Saga
- Celebrity Suit for Alan
- Parliament Shotgun Skin for Alan
- Lantern Charm for Saga

name: Starlink Battle For Atlas: Lance Starship Pack
description: Enhance your adventure and achieve victory through creative combat with the Lance Starship pack

name: Monopoly
description: Monopoly is back with a fresh look and an improved game experience. Buy, sell, trade properties, and grow your empire in this faithful adaptation of the game we all grew up with! Dive into the centre of the board to explore a gorgeous fully animated 3D city.

name: For Honor: The Muramasa Blade
description: Sin descripción

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Season 1 - First Rogue
description: Sin descripción

name: XDefiant: Season 1 - GSK
description: Sin descripción

name: Skull and Bones: Season 3 - Into the Dragon’s Wake
description: Sin descripción

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Divine Trials
description: Sin descripción

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Mask of Darkness
description: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown's tale of monsters, mythology, and Immortals left one conspicuous thread unresolved: the fate of the mysterious masked Immortal, Radjen. When the Mask of Darkness DLC launches on September 17, players can discover a new chapter of Sargon's story as they confront the myriad dangers of Radjen's Mind Palace. But the new DLC is much more than a story expansion, opening up a whole new biome filled with fresh traversal elements, traps, enemies, and more.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - The Sky Breaker
description:
In The Sky Breaker, you’ll continue your Na’vi journey begun in the main game, this time to The Heart of the Plains, a yet-to-be-discovered area of the Upper Plains. Here, familiar biomes have bloomed into breathtaking new variations, while other environments such as the Prism Fields, Feathered Grasslands, Stone Rapids and more, are brand new!

While exploring the Heart of the Plains, you’ll encounter a new enemy archetype, the AMP Defender, which protects key facilities with its indestructible shield and top-mounted gatling gun. You’ll also encounter new RDA lieutenants, whose AMP Suits provide added firepower and better protection, in each of the RDA Command Stations.

Finally, you’ll be able to take part in timed challenges during the festival of games, level up to master crafter with the new Legendary rarity category and progress up to rank 25 with new ways to spend skill points.

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Season 4
description:
Time to get ready for what's coming next, Festival-goers!

With Ubisoft Forward fast approaching, we wanted to thank you all for an amazing first year, your continued feedback, and for making The Crew Motorfest what it is today!

We have some exciting news to share with you next week, but before that, we wanted to give you a first look at what's coming for the end of Year 1:

Season 4 will be your next stop at Motorfest - and trust us, your customization skills will have to reach new heights as we kick off a brand-new playlist.

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Season 7
description: Sin descripción
